title: ‚ÄòWhat the hell, dude‚Äô? Chuck Schumer pitches snit fit over DeVos confirmation
text:
‚Äî Curtis Houck (@CurtisHouck) February 7, 2017 What is it with you Democrats and being outraged by following rules? @SenSchumer @VP So Pence should have approved someone he DIDN'T approve of? Is that what you're saying? 
Dude. Don't open your mouth if it's raining. #Drown https://t.co/GzUCS19qQ0 
‚Äî MushKilo*Alpha*Tango (@MushKat) February 7, 2017 @SenSchumer @VP It's kind of how the system works. The only thing 'rigged' are your talking points. And your party. Delete your account. 
‚Äî The Mental Recession (@rustyweiss74) February 7, 2017 
Poor Chuck. He‚Äôs gonna need a big-ass hankie to dry all these tears. Seems to me that he should be bitching at Harry Reid, but üê∏‚òïÔ∏è @Stmpy_Mch @SenSchumer @VP 
Right? No kidding! Thanks to all of you who encouraged me to consider filibuster reform. It had to be done.
